label: Software Engineer
prompt: Create a modern portfolio for a Software Engineer. Include a hero section with name and title, about section, skills showcase with tech stack (React, Node.js, Python, etc.), 3-4 featured projects with descriptions, and contact section. Use a professional blue and white color scheme.

label: Designer Showcase
prompt: Design a creative portfolio for a UI/UX Designer. Include a bold hero section, about me with design philosophy, skills section, project gallery with case studies showing design process, and contact form. Use vibrant colors and modern aesthetics.

label: Minimal Developer
prompt: Create a minimal, clean portfolio for a Full Stack Developer. Focus on simplicity with a hero section, brief about, tech skills list, project cards with GitHub links, and contact info. Use monochrome or pastel color scheme.

label: Creative Portfolio
prompt: Build a bold and creative portfolio for a Creative Professional. Include an eye-catching hero, storytelling about section, visual skills display, impressive project showcase with images, and social links. Use warm sunset or vibrant multi-color theme.
